named-query.name: Restaurante.consultarPorNomeECozinhaId
named-query.query: from Restaurante where nome like concat('%', :nome, '%') and cozinha.id = :cozinhaId

named-query.name: Restaurante.existeResponsavel
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurante rest join rest.usuariosResponsaveis resp where rest.id = :restauranteId and resp.id = :usuarioId
